suggest.monolog/monolog: 1.0.* | If you want to enable logging
suggest.symfony/yaml: 2.1.* | If you want to enable configuration reader (ConfigurationServiceProvider)
suggest.symfony/console: >=2.1,<=2.2 | If you want to enable console service (ConsoleServiceProvider)
suggest.doctrine/orm: 2.2.* | If you want to enable Doctrine ORM service (DoctrineORMServiceProvider)
suggest.doctrine/data-fixtures: 1.0.* | If you want to enable fixtures load command (LoadDataFixturesDoctrineCommand)
suggest.symfony/validator: 2.1.* | If you want to enable validation annotations (AnnotationValidatorServiceProvider)
suggest.twig/twig: 1.9.* | If you want to enable asset twig function (TwigServiceProvder && AssetServiceProvider)
suggest.symfony/translation: 2.1.* | If you want to enable translation (TranslationServiceProvider)
